item.title: Interview with Lauren Talbot - Quantitative analyst for the NYC Financial Crime Task Force
item.description: Lauren Talbot Lauren Talbot is a quantitative analystÂ for the New York City Financial Crime Task Force. Before working for NYC she was an analyst at Acumen LLC and got her degree in economics from Stanford University. She is a key player turning spatial data in NYC into new tools for government management. We talked to Lauren about her work, how she is using open data to do things like predict where fires might occur, and how she got started in the Financial Crime Task Force.
